properties.description: Fintech company licensed by the Saudi Central Bank; operates in Saudi Arabia's banking sector with 235 employees; received $129.7M in external funding in 2024-2025; headquartered in Al Khobar, KSA. Specializes in personal finance solutions and bill splitting services.
properties.content:
# Easier life with Tasheel

Financing, Simplified

[**Personal Finance** \
Easy & fast personal finance up to 250,000 straight in your account within 48H\
\
Easy & fast personal finance up to 250,000 straight in your account within 48H](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/personal-finance) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/personal-finance) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/personal-finance)

[**Split it your way** \
The best way of splitting your bills without down payment and with flexible payment plans starting from 1 payment up to 36 payments\
\
The best way of splitting your bills without down payment and with flexible payment plans starting from 1 payment up to 36 payments](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/baseeta) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/baseeta) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/baseeta)

[**Credit Card** \
Get up to 100,000 credit limit with great cashback and no annual fees for the 1st year\
\
Get up to 100,000 credit limit with great cashback and no annual fees for the 1st year](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/credit-cards) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/credit-cards/) [Apply now](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/credit-cards)

## Tasheel Finance - Award winning innovative fintech company licensed by The Saudi Central Bank

We enable our customers to enrich their lives and achieve their ambitions by providing effortless financial services through innovative digital solutions, all online and hassle- free

### Speed

Fully online, fast and seamless application process, with instant approval

### Simplicity

Hassle free financing with transparent terms and without guarantor or salary transfer

### Service

Reliable customer support through phone, social media, and +50 branches across KSA

### Security

Committed to securing and safeguarding your data with the latest technology

[About Tasheel](https://www.tasheelfinance.com/about/)

## Customer Testimonials

#### karoom\_54321

شكرا لكم نزل المبلغ في الموعد

#### @FatimaSami94

صراحة افضل موظفة في تسهيل تعاملت معها هي شوق الزهراني في مستشفى سنترل كير للامانه تعامل وصبر واسلوب

#### @Haannaadyy

عروض جميله فعلا بالتوفيق ان شاء الله

#### @soma\_675

إجراءات الكترونية سهلة وسريعة دون الحاجة لزيارة الفرع

#### @1Geemini\_

بنص ساعه الاجرأت وخلال ساعات نزل المبلغ في حسابي

company.name: Tasheel Finance
company.about: Fintech company licensed by the Saudi Central Bank; operates in Saudi Arabia's banking sector with 235 employees; received $129.7M in external funding in 2024-2025; headquartered in Al Khobar, KSA. Specializes in personal finance solutions and bill splitting services.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the banking industry, is headquartered in Saudi Arabia (KSA), has between 201 and 500 employees, and has received external funding as of 2025
evaluations.reasoning: Tasheel Finance is a fintech company licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, indicating it operates in the banking sector under Saudi regulation. Its official website lists its headquarters at 8868 Malik Bin Qais – Al Rawabi District, Unit No. 8872, Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia, confirming a KSA location. The company profile shows 235 employees, which falls within the 201‑500 range. It has received external funding, with debt financing rounds reported in November 2024 and May 2025, totaling $129.7 million. All four criteria are met.
